title.rendered: AM by Anggia presented Women’s Fall/Winter 22/23 – Paris Fashion Week 2022

content.rendered:
AM by Anggia is a sustainable brand that uses recycling as its design strategy. They utilize rejected denim garments from local factories, with a combination of locally made environmentally friendly textiles. AM carries themes of androgyny, deconstruction, sporty casual aesthetics.

Designer Anggia


By Fashion-editor : Christina V Henningstad  Production: Fashionview
